sentences.english: The article discusses the elimination of phenol with sodium permanganate oxidation in water.
sentences.chinese: 研究了高錳酸鈉對水中苯酚的去除作用。

sentences.english: Fluid column has been adopted in the research on adsorption of phenol in fine sandy soil saturated with water.
sentences.chinese: 採用流動柱法研究苯酚在飽水細砂土中的吸附。

sentences.english: The application of activated carbon fibers (ACFs) to removing phenol from water was studied.
sentences.chinese: 採用活性炭纖維吸附法淨化水中微量的苯酚。

sentences.english: Carbolic acid can damage internal organs if ingested.
sentences.chinese: 苯酚如果被攝入體內，可能會損壞人體的內臟。

sentences.english: The adsorption condition and effect of bamboo-charcoal supporting silver(BCSS)for phenol were studied.
sentences.chinese: 研究了自制載銀竹炭對苯酚的吸附條件與效果。

sentences.english: The resulting composite film was applied to entrap tyrosinase for fabricating phenol biosensor.
sentences.chinese: 用此雜化膜包埋酪氨酸酶，製備電化學苯酚傳感器。

sentences.english: Objective To establish a UV-spectrophotometry method to determine the content of phenol in calamine and menthol lotion.
sentences.chinese: 目的建立爐甘石薄荷腦洗劑中苯酚含量的測定方法。

sentences.english: Some phenolics , if consumed in small amounts, are believed to lower the risk of heart disease.
sentences.chinese: 苯酚少量的攝取，據相信是可以降低心臟疾病的風險。

sentences.english: The reaction between Tung Oil and phenol has been studied.
sentences.chinese: 本文研究了桐油和苯酚在酸催化劑存在下的反應過程。

sentences.english: An analysis method of nonlinear absorbance for binary composition mixture was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了苯酚和鄰氯苯酚混合體系非線性吸光度表示式。

sentences.english: An analysis method of nonlinear absorbance for binary composition mixture was proposed.
sentences.chinese: 提出了苯酚和鄰氯苯酚混合體系非線性吸光度表示式。

sentences.english: For PCP reaction rate of photocatalytic oxidation is much higher than that of photolysis.
sentences.chinese: 五氯苯酚光催化氧化速率明顯高於光分解。

sentences.english: Mechanism for the electrochemical-oxidation of phenol and the enhancement effect of CTAB were investigated.
sentences.chinese: 本文對CTAB對苯酚氧化的增敏機理進行了探討。

sentences.english: The phenol -sulphate acid inspect method of Cordyceps militaris exopolyaccharide was researched.
sentences.chinese: 探討了用硫酸苯酚法測定北冬蟲夏草多糖含量的方法。

sentences.english: A gas chromatographic method for the determination of phenol in some biologics was developed.
sentences.chinese: 本文采用氣相色譜法測定了幾種生物製品中苯酚含量。

sentences.english: PCP is widely used as a fungicide and wood preservative.
sentences.chinese: 五氯苯酚被廣泛用作殺真菌劑和木柴防腐劑。
